title: V-Collect
description: SWaCH collects and recycles your old electronic items, furniture, bicycles, kitchen utensils, etc.

title: Recycling Trail
description: SWaCH conducts field visits to learn how the city handles its garbage on a day-to-day basis.

title: Red Dot Awareness
description: SWaCHâ€™s Red Dot awareness program targets the safe disposal of sanitary pads and diapers.

title: Composting Services
description: SWaCH provides expertise and materials needed to install composting infrastructure in both residential and commercial spaces.

title: Waste Collection At Events
description: SWaCH teams manage waste at events including marathons, conferences and melas.

title: E-Collect
description: SWaCH enables organisations to meet regulatory requirements for the safe disposal of e-waste.

title: MLP Collection
description: SWaCH is partnering with ITC & Pune Municipal Corporation to collect and recycle MLP waste.
